content: the tess treasured bookmark is a super quick make that is perfect for decreasing your ever growing yarn stash tess therese eghult from us at sistersinstitch is here to guide you step-by-step through this quickie make this pattern requires less than 2 gram of yarn so now you can turn those amazing scraps that you haven t had the heart to get rid of into darling bookmarks for you and yours named after the designer herself tess designed this to keep track of all the patterns she was working on in the ultimate granny square sourcebook with over a 100 to keep track of let s just say that she needed several and so the tess treasured bookmark came to be whether you re a beginner or more advanced crocheter we hope you ll like it and have a lovely time happy crocheting xxx tess & kay fun fact tess actually made a bookmark for each of the signed books bought from out shop using the scrap yarns from the skeins used for the squares that is seen in the book she only made one in each color so everyone would get one uniquely for them
